name: New HIV Treatment
sql:
/*
  * Name:New HIV Treatment
  * Query Type: SQL Cohort Query
  * Description: HIV patients for starting treatment
  * Currently assuming database is only HIV patients
  * HIV Case Reporting Module already excludes patients previously added to the list
  */

  SELECT person_id
  FROM obs
  WHERE
  date(date_created) >= date(:lastExecutionTime)
  AND
  (
  (
  concept_id = :CIEL_1255
  AND value_coded = :CIEL_1256
  )
  OR
  (
  concept_id = :CIEL_1251
  AND value_coded = :CIEL_1185
  )
  )
  AND not voided;
